snaplet-tasks-0.1.1: Snaplet for Snap Framework enabling developers to administrative tasks akin to Rake tasks from Ruby On Rails framework.

task :: String -> Handler b v () -> (ByteString, Handler b v ())

Helper function for creating tasks in Snaplets routes that are available through Tasks Snaplet interface
